description: This file is the main application entry point for a Lightning.js-based frontend. It sets up the application with theme styling, routing, and initialization hooks.

classes.name: Blits.Application
classes.description: Main application class from the Lightning.js framework used to bootstrap the app.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the main UI template for the application, including background element and router view.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initial application state containing background color from theme.

methods.name: hooks.ready
methods.description: Initialization hook that sets the document body's styles when the app is ready.
